predicate.note: Frames file for 'deform' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Reshaping.

roleset.name: take on a new (usually bad) form

example.name: adjectival
example.text: The wall behind me was slightly deformed, but the center had held.

example.name: verbal
example.text: Mary's frequent beatings deformed John's spine and shoulders.
